txt.en:
'Many Galadhrim have fallen to the blades of Mazog's Orcs, [placeholder]. The Orcs have spirited away many items belonging to those Elves as trophies, and we wish them returned to us.

'Will you travel to the lumber-camp of Drûmaudhul and search for any of these stolen belongings? The encampment is large and surely well-guarded, but I am confident in your abilities.

'Drûmaudhul lies to the north-west of here. Recover what you can and bring it to me, and you will be rewarded.'
'You have recovered more than I could have dreamed possible, [placeholder]! Thank you for your earnest efforts.'
'The Galadhrim will be grateful for any stolen belongings you can return to us.'
'Were you not able to recover the stolen belongings from Drûmaudhul, [placeholder]?'
The Orcs of Moria have begun mustering in Fanuidhol in preparation to assault Lothlórien.
Collected crates of stolen belongings at Drûmaudhul ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Collect crates of stolen belongings at Drûmaudhul ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Drûmaudhul lies to the north-west from Talan Gwilith.\n\nMaeriel has asked you to enter Drûmaudhul and collect any stolen belongings you find there.
Bring stolen belongings to Maeriel at Talan Gwilith
Maeriel is at Talan Gwilith, south-east of Drûmaudhul.\n\nYou should return to Maeriel with the stolen belongings you recovered.
